quotes.text: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: We are a way for the universe to know itself.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: I'll miss the sea, but a person needs new experiences. They jar something deep inside, allowing him to grow. Without change something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken.
quotes.author: Leto Atreides, Dune
